meanings.definition: A category of biological classification ranking below family and above species.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied a new genus of plants.
meanings.sent2: The lion belongs to the same genus as the tiger.
meanings.sent3: The genus of colorful birds had a party in the forest.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cars, the sports car is the genus of speed.
meanings.sent5: The genus of fish with long fins was easy to spot in the aquarium.

meanings.definition: A class, group, or kind sharing certain characteristics or qualities.
meanings.sent1: The genus of fast animals includes cheetahs and gazelles.
meanings.sent2: The genus of flowers in the garden attracted many bees.
meanings.sent3: The genus of funny jokes made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: In the world of music, rock is the genus of energy.
meanings.sent5: The genus of friendly dogs wagged their tails happily in the park.
